name: Cyber Fundraiser Lite
author: cybersourcepk

sections.description:
Cyber fundraiser lite provide facility to non-profit orginizations to publish campaign and collect donations using emails and social media.
This plugin can be use for fundraising by education, poverty, health, human services, religion, environment and animals etc. cyber fundraiser come with different payment gateways.

Features

  • Engage through Social Media
  • Create Unlimited fundraising Campaign
  • Multiple Fundraisers under one campaign
  • A fundraiser can join multiple campaigns
  • Personalized pages for fundraisers
  • Mass email service, including templates for invitation and thank you letters
  • Builtin widgets for facebook, twitter, project status, donors list and donation button
  • Mobile optimized
  • Adding offline donations
  • Manage fundraiser from backend
  • Highly customizable through hooks and filters
  • Email templates for
  • new donor
  • Donation Status Completed
  • Donation Status Pending
  • New Become Fundraiser
  • Become Fundraiser Approved
  • Become Fundraiser Rejected
  • Become Fundraiser Closed
  • Importing Demo content for each section
  • Adding custom elements
  • Multiple templates types
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder cyber-fundraiser-lite to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add some setting from setting page
  4. Upload Demo data
sections.faq:
For any question please check the documentation

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder cyber-fundraiser-lite to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add some setting from setting page
  4. Upload Demo data
